title: Crypto Influencer Predicts $XRP and $SHIB Prices Could Skyrocket in Next Bull Run
description: A popular cryptocurrency influencer has recently predicted that the price of both $XRP and the meme-inspired cryptocurrency Shiba Inu ($SHIB) will surge exponentially in the next bull run, seeing the native token of the XRP Ledger “return to the top 3” and SHIB in the top 5. The influencer, Del Crxpto, made his prediction in […]

title: SEC Chief Accountant Emphasizes Legal Liabilities for Accountants Auditing Crypto Firms
description: In a recent statement, Paul Munter, the Chief Accountant of the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), issued a stern warning to accounting firms regarding their responsibilities when auditing cryptocurrency firms. The rise of the cryptocurrency industry has led to an increasing number of accounting firms engaging with these companies to review certain aspects ... Read more
